add_structure.Name: add_structure
add_structure.Description: Add trial and/or block marker events.

add_trial_numbers.Name: add_trial_numbers
add_trial_numbers.Description: Add a column with trial numbers.

derive_column.Name: derive_columns
derive_column.Description: Create a new column using a mapping from existing columns.
derive_column.Long description: Create a new column or overwrite values in an existing column using a mapping from existing columns. Can also be used to overwrite values on existing columns, only values with the predefined combinations will be overwritten.

factor_column.Name: factor_column
factor_column.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

factor_hed.Name: factor_column
factor_hed.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

merge_events.Name: factor_column
merge_events.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

order_columns.Name: factor_column
order_columns.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

rename_columns.Name: factor_column
rename_columns.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

remove_columns.Name: factor_column
remove_columns.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

remove_rows.Name: factor_column
remove_rows.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

split_events.Name: factor_column
split_events.Description: Derive a new column from a combination of existing columns.

returns.error_type: Type of error if the service failed.
returns.error_msg: Explanation of the message if the service failed.

results.command: Command executed in response to the service request.
results.command_target: Type of data on which the command was executed.
results.definitions: A dictionary of definitions used in processing.
results.data: Data returned by the service (either processed result or a list of errors).
results.msg_category: Success or warning depending on the result of processing the service.
results.msg: Explanation of the output of the service.
results.output_display_name: (Optional) File name for saving return data.
results.schema_version: (Optional) Version of the HED schema used in the processing.
results.software_version: A dictionary of the version and date of hedtools and hed services.
